title: inda parAmukhamA
sahitya:
inda parAmukhamA EzhaiyiDam ennammA ennai
 mukham pArttiranNga en annai unaiyanri evar unakk-


anupallavi

  cintai kalangi dinam sheivinai onrariyAdu
tIvinai purinduzhalum pAviyenru pEdaiyidam unakk-


caraNam    bhakthargaL unaip-pugazhndu pAduvataik-kETTadundu en
pAzhvinai engO ennai izhuttuc shellum koDumai
cittam irangik-kaDaikkaN pArttaruL tarAviDilen
sheivadenrariyEn karuNaik-kaDal unakken mIdu
